archimate:Requirement.name: REQ_BSS_1031
archimate:Requirement.documentation: As a customer, I want to easily see and book discounted movies directly through Vodafone to enjoy the cost savings

properties.value: [CLM] To be analysed as an integration, this kind of service was delivered many times along with CLM implementation, possible integration over API/Kafka/Batch, embeeded web page, to be clarified

properties.key: Applies to Consumer only, Business only, or Both
